creator: Jocelyn Yang
title: Crypto Markets Today: Binance a Target of Federal Probe
dc:creator: Jocelyn Yang
content: Industry woes widened on Monday with a Reuters report that  U.S. prosecutors are considering criminal charges against Binance and individual senior executives, including CEO Changpeng Zhao. Crypto Markets Today is CoinDeskâ€™s daily newsletter diving into what happened in today's crypto markets.
contentSnippet: Industry woes widened on Monday with a Reuters report that  U.S. prosecutors are considering criminal charges against Binance and individual senior executives, including CEO Changpeng Zhao. Crypto Markets Today is CoinDeskâ€™s daily newsletter diving into what happened in today's crypto markets.

creator: Sage D. Young
title: Polygonâ€™s NFT Market Demonstrates Signs of Significant Increased Adoption, but Not Growth in Sale Volume, Nansen Data Shows
dc:creator: Sage D. Young
content: Amid a crypto winter exacerbated by the FTX fallout, first-time and returning buyers have reached all-time highs in Polygonâ€™s non-fungible token market. Yet, sales volumes are near all-time lows.
contentSnippet: Amid a crypto winter exacerbated by the FTX fallout, first-time and returning buyers have reached all-time highs in Polygonâ€™s non-fungible token market. Yet, sales volumes are near all-time lows.

creator: Jesse Hamilton
title: US Senators Rebuke Sam Bankman-Fried for Refusing Invitations to Testify
dc:creator: Jesse Hamilton
content: Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Friend has rebuffed attempts from the top members of the Senate Banking Committee to get him to testify, despite a willingness to participate in several other interviews and a similar hearing in the House of Representatives.
contentSnippet: Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Friend has rebuffed attempts from the top members of the Senate Banking Committee to get him to testify, despite a willingness to participate in several other interviews and a similar hearing in the House of Representatives.

creator: Nikhilesh De
title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried Arrested, Bahamas Says
dc:creator: Nikhilesh De
content: The Royal Bahamas Police Force arrested FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried, a press statement said.
contentSnippet: The Royal Bahamas Police Force arrested FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried, a press statement said.

creator: Cointelegraph By  Tom Blackstone
title: 13% of Americans have now held crypto: JPMorgan research
dc:creator: Cointelegraph By  Tom Blackstone
content: The JPMorgan report is based on a study of cash transfers from banks to crypto accounts for over 5 million customers.
contentSnippet: The JPMorgan report is based on a study of cash transfers from banks to crypto accounts for over 5 million customers.

creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
title: Breaking: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried arrested and in custody
dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
content: Royal Bahamas police have arrested SBF at the request of the U.S. government, based on a sealed indictment.
contentSnippet: Royal Bahamas police have arrested SBF at the request of the U.S. government, based on a sealed indictment.

creator: Guillermo Jimenez
title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried Arrested in Bahamas
dc:creator: Guillermo Jimenez
content: The arrest "followed receipt of formal notification from the United States that it has filed criminal charges against SBF," the police statement said.
contentSnippet: The arrest "followed receipt of formal notification from the United States that it has filed criminal charges against SBF," the police statement said.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried Arrested in The Bahamas
content:encoded:
Bahamian authorities have arrested disgraced former crypto billionaire Sam Bankman-Fried at the request of the US government, according to the Prime Minister’s Director of Communications, Latrae Rahming.

Bankman-Fried will be held in custody in accordance with the Bahamas Extradition Act, according to a document from the Office of the Attorney General and Ministry of Legal Affairs.

Prime Minister Philip Davis said in a statement, â€œThe Bahamas and the United States have a shared interest in holding accountable all individuals associated with FTX who may have betrayed the public trust and broken the law.â€

Rahming’s office could not be reached by phone, and did not immediately respond to an emailed request for comment.

The arrest comes as a result of a sealed indictment filed by the Southern District of New York (SDNY), according to a tweet citing a statement by US Attorney Damian Williams.

Followers of the FTX saga wereÂ eagerÂ to hear from the former CEO, who was expected to testify remotely in a Congressional hearing scheduled for Tuesday. Bankman-Fried revealed he was still in the Bahamas, while answering questions on a Twitter space, Monday. It’s not yet known whether he will be called to testify after his arrest.

Bankman-Fried had been asked by the Senate Banking Committee to testify at a Wednesday hearing about his collapsed company, but refused to do so, according to the committee.Â  Pat Toomey and Sen. Sherrod Brown threatened to Subpoena Bankman-Fried if he opted not to appear.

Bankman-Fried will be represented in court by former assistant US attorney for the Eastern District of New York Mark S. Cohen.

This is a developing story and may be updated.

Get the dayâ€™s top crypto news and insights delivered to your inbox every evening. Subscribe to Blockworksâ€™ free newsletter now.


Can’t wait? Get our news the fastest way possible. Join us on Telegram.

USA Damian Williams: Earlier this evening, Bahamian authorities arrested Samuel Bankman-Fried at the request of the U.S. Government, based on a sealed indictment filed by the SDNY.  We expect to move to unseal the indictment in the morning and will have more to say at that time.
â€” US Attorney SDNY (@SDNYnews) December 12, 2022

Bankman-Fried revealed he was still in the Bahamas, while answering questions on a Twitter space, Monday. Itâ€™s not yet known whether he will be called to testify after his arrest.
Bankman-Fried had been asked by the Senate Banking Committee to testify at a Wednesday hearing about his collapsed company, but refused to do so, according to the committee.Â  Pat Toomey and Sen. Sherrod Brown threatened to Subpoena Bankman-Fried if he opted not to appear.

creator: James Rubin, Sam Reynolds
title: First Mover Asia: QCP Capital Founder Sees Crypto Industryâ€™s Immediate Future Tied to Genesis Debacle, Expects Rebound in 2024
dc:creator: James Rubin, Sam Reynolds
content: During a panel discussion at Taipei Blockchain Week, Darius Sit noted the continued institutional adoption of the crypto options and derivatives market, among industry high points; former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried arrested.
contentSnippet: During a panel discussion at Taipei Blockchain Week, Darius Sit noted the continued institutional adoption of the crypto options and derivatives market, among industry high points; former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried arrested.

creator: Krisztian  Sandor
title: Binance Withdrawals Surge as Concerns About Its Reserve Report Spook Traders
dc:creator: Krisztian  Sandor
content: Binance endured $902 million of net outflows in the past 24 hours, according to data by Nansen.
contentSnippet: Binance endured $902 million of net outflows in the past 24 hours, according to data by Nansen.

creator: Nikhilesh De
title: US Judge in Ooki DAO Trial Orders CFTC to Serve Original Founders With Lawsuit
dc:creator: Nikhilesh De
content: Federal judge William Orrick said he did not previously know that Tom Bean and Kyle Kistner were current token-holders at Ooki DAO.
contentSnippet: Federal judge William Orrick said he did not previously know that Tom Bean and Kyle Kistner were current token-holders at Ooki DAO.

creator: Jocelyn Yang
title: SynFutures Says New V2 Upgrade Adds â€˜Permissionless Listingâ€™ of Futures
dc:creator: Jocelyn Yang
content: The upgrades include permissionless trading and improved user protections amid to widens accessibility of DeFi among retail investors, according to Singapore-based SynFutures.
contentSnippet: The upgrades include permissionless trading and improved user protections amid to widens accessibility of DeFi among retail investors, according to Singapore-based SynFutures.
